joke: Why did the photon refuse to check luggage at the airport? Because it was traveling light since the Big Bang!

timepoint: Timepoint #2 - The Milky Way Forms (in entirety)
joke: What kind of chocolate do astronomers prefer? A Mars bar, because they love a taste of the Milky Way!
Why did the sun go to school? To get a little brighter!
What did Earth say to the other planets? "You guys have no life!"
Life is like a pun; it's all about how you interpret it.
Why was the cell so good at networking? It had excellent cell reception!
Why did the scarecrow become a successful gardener? Because he was outstanding in his field!
What do you call a dinosaur with an extensive vocabulary? A thesaurus!

timepoint: Timepoint #9 - First Members of the Genus Homo
joke: Why did the Homo sapiens bring a ladder to the bar? Because they heard the drinks were on the house!
Why did the ancient civilization start a band? Because they wanted to make some historic beats!
